about_the_game:
EPIC VR vs. PC BATTLES


Fight as the mighty Giant or the nimble Warrior in the Proving Ground map!



  • Gather your friends and compete in arcade-style battles designed for VR pass-and-play multiplayer.
  • Play online using Steam Remote Play or Parsec. VR players must host the game and invite PC players to join in the battle.
  • Embody the Giant in VR with physical, destructive attacks that require you to move your whole body.
  • Control the Warrior on PC to build up an explosive arsenal and barrage the Giant.
  • Customize your battles by adjusting pickup placement, scoring rules, and more.
  • Compatible with all major PC VR platforms, including Oculus Rift CV1, Oculus Rift S, HTC Vive, and Valve Index.

name: DAVIGO KNIGHT'S PASS
short_description: Davigo is a VR vs. PC battle game. The VR player embodies a giant and faces off against one or more PC warriors in fast-paced, explosive combat!
